thread.title: UNLV-Boise State game time set, will be on ESPNU
thread.title_full: UNLV-Boise State game time set, will be on ESPNU

title: UNLV-Boise State game time set, will be on ESPNU
text:
UNLV-Boise State game time set, will be on ESPNU UNLV-Boise State game time set, will be on ESPNU 
UNLV quarterback Kurt Palandech (14) turns to hand off the ball in the first half against Fresno State at Bulldog Stadium in Fresno, Calif., on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Chase Stevens/Las Vegas Review-Journal Follow @CSStevensphoto UNLV-Boise State game time set, will be on ESPNU 
Oct 16, 2015; Logan, UT, USA; Boise State Broncos running back Devan Demas (26) carries the ball as Utah State Aggies cornerback Deshane Hines (17) defends at Romney Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Rob Gray-USA TODAY Sports By Mark AndersonLas Vegas Review-Journal 
UNLV football fans can go watch the Rebels play Boise State on Halloween at Sam Boyd Stadium and take their kids trick-or-treating. 
The teams will meet at 12:30 p.m., and ESPNU will televise the game. 
UNLV (2-5, 1-2 Mountain West) is off this week. The Rebels are coming off a 31-28 loss at Fresno State on Friday . 
Boise State (5-2, 2-1) watched its chances of making a New Year's Six game for the second season in a row disappear after losing 52-26 at Utah State on Friday. The Broncos host Wyoming (1-6, 1-2) this Saturday. 
Contact Mark Anderson at manderson@reviewjournal.com or 702-387-2914.
